p: Specimens were processed in a biosafety level 3 (BSL3) environment and manipulated under BSL2 conditions after inactivation. Nucleic acid extraction was performed using a MagMAX TM Pathogen RNA/DNA kit (Life Technologies, Carlsbad CA, USA) in accordance with the manufacturer’s instructions. Approximately 30 mg of tissue were disrupted in 600 μl of lysis buffer; an aliquot of 115 μl of the lysate was then mixed with 20 μl of bead mix plus and 65 μl of 100% isopropanol. The extraction was carried out in a KingFisherFlex Automatic Extractor (Thermo Fisher Scientific, Waltham, USA) in accordance with the manufacturer’s instructions.
